siteMetadata.title: Rem Lampa: On Web Development, Startups & Film Photography

markdownRemark.html:
I’ve never had the chance to blog regularly as promised. So I’ve decided to just move my blog from Wordpress (hosted on SiteGround) to Gatsby.js (hosted on Github pages). My blog frequency couldn’t justify the high costs of paying for an expensive web server.

I’ll try to blog more often, especially about the experiences I’m about to have while my team and I build our startup, FarmGoat, from the ground up.

Stay tuned.
